name: Dynamic Surroundings
desc: Adds various visual and audio effects to improve immersion.

name: Better Foliage
desc: Makes your game look more impressive, mainly by improving how vegetation looks. Consider disabling this if you have a lower-end computer.

name: Sound Filters
desc: Adds various sound filters based on player location, including reverb in caves and muted sounds underwater.

name: Ambient Sounds
desc: Adds various ambient noises to enhance immersion.

name: Chunk Pregenerator
desc: A utility mod which allows you to pregenerate worlds. Useful for server owners but not the standard player.

name: Smart HUD
desc: Adds a configurable HUD next to the hotbar which shows items like the clock or compass at all times. Also adds an item pickup display in the bottom left.

name: Batty's Coordinates
desc: A HUD feature that adds coordinate and position info in the corner of your screen. Useful for communicating your location to other players or for tracking down your gravestone.
